General.Name: GameSparcs Co Ltd
General.Description: Gamesparcs Co.,Ltd. engages in the designing, development, operation, and licensing of games. The company also distributes mobile games. In addition, it provides general advertising services and game peripheral products. The company was formerly known as Net Publishing Co., Ltd. Gamesparcs Co.,Ltd. was founded in 1999 and is based in Taichung, Taiwan.
